Package battle.graphics

package battle.graphics
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BattlePanel
    The BattlePanel class represents the main panel where the battle interface is displayed.
    Constants
    The Costanti class contains constants used throughout the battle graphics.
    GameInfo
    GameInfo is a custom JPanel that displays information about the chosen profile and the trainers' wins.
    JLayeredTextPanel
    The JLayeredTextPanel class manages different panels for displaying text, choosing moves, and learning new moves during a battle.
    PokemonImageMapper
    The PokemonImageMapper class provides a mapping between PokÃ©mon names and their corresponding image numbers.
    PokemonImagePanel
    PokemonImagePanel is a custom JPanel that displays a PokÃ©mon image.
    PokemonStatsPanel
    PokemonStatsPanel is a custom JPanel that displays a PokÃ©mon's stats.
    ShiftSpecifier
    ShiftSpecifier is a custom JPanel that displays the trainer's name and the turn message.
